title: The Ghosts of Gray Fable
description: Grace "Gray" Fable is not exactly happy about transferring to Willowbrook in the fall. Since she was very young, Gray has been able to see and speak to ghosts. Now she's going to a school where there was a high school shooting five years earlier. Gray is not worried about coming face to face with a live shooter: she's worried about seeing a dead one.
author: Eli Bloom
